name: Wake Up (itch) (Olon1993)
description:
You find yourself in a strange place. The watch on your wrist has said 3AM for hours and you don't remember how you got here. The hellish creature pursuing you is like something out of a nightmare. This maze, it twists and winds into oblivion. You must keep running. You must wake up.

Wake Up is a survival horror "endless" runner created by Ricky Martinez and Scott Batey for the 2020 Mix and Game Jam. Can you save all the survivors? Can you find the exit? Please enjoy and leave a comment.
